name: E09
description:
Glass earrings.  

Metals fused within the layers of glass, create the explosion of color.  

The glass is cradled within a patinized brass bezel.  The ear wires are made of oxidized sterling silver.

A modern element in glass, paired with a vintage inspired setting to warm things up.  

Please let us know if you have any questions.

Size 7. (US)....Actually, a teeny tiny bit smaller than a 7.

name: BB23
E01
description:
Put away the pearls...these are your new everyday posts.  

The hexagons are made of patinized brass, with a solid sterling silver backing and ear post.

name: Nouveau Necklace
description: This necklace will be featured at SOFA New York with Urban Glass, April 20 - 23, 2012.

name: Aves Nouveau Earrings
description:
These earrings are made of kilnformed glass, that have been carved by hand.

Shades of blue have been combined together to highlight the central nouveau theme.   

Light will transfer through the layers of translucent glass.

The earwires are sterling silver.  

The glass measures 13/16" wide, by 1 1/4" in length, and is just under 1/8" in thickness.  These earrings are light weight and very comfortable in the ear.

name: Linear Hex Earrings
description:
A perfect earring for everyday.  

Delicate brass hexagons dance along the hand-formed teardrops and circles.  

Available in sterling silver and brass, bronze and brass (See options in the pull down menu to the right).  

Each pair of earrings comes with sterling silver ear wires.

options.name: E021 Teardrop Hex Earrings Sterling and Brass
E022 Trio of Circles Hex Earrings in Sterling and Brass

name: A Goat
description:
This is a part of a series of glass wall panels that I have recently been working on. 

My husband and I fantasize of having a farm someday. For now, photographing the animals and capturing the memories in glass makes me happy, and is slightly more realistic. 

The glass measures 5/16" thick x 10 3/16" in height x 19 3/8" in length, and it sits off of the wall 1".

Please let me know if you have any questions, or if you would like to see more of the animals.

A template will be included with the packaging materials, it will help you to accurately drill holes in the wall for the brackets.

name: In Flight Buckle, WSJ Magazine Buckle
description:
This particular buckle was recently featured in the Wall Street Journal Magazine, October 2011 Issue.

Organic shapes in silver float within the ivory glass.  When the glass and the silver are heated together, the slate and sepia tones around the metal emerge.  A classic STF buckle, with a twist...a satin finish.

Glass Belt Buckle Only. 

This buckle is made to order, and is no longer available for holiday delivery.  If your time frame is flexible, and delivery in early 2012 works, than contact us to place an order, 508.991.0747.

These buckles measure approximately 2 1/4" x 3 1/4".

Check out the Belt Section to pick the perfect strap to pair with your buckle.

Slight variations may occur, due to the fact that each buckle is handmade.

name: Teal Quadrant Bracelet
description:
A cuff bracelet.

Different metals are used within the layers of glass to create the patterns.  The glass is carved by hand after it has been fired to bring out the details from within the surface.  The glass including the bezel measures 3/16" thick  x  1 1/2" in height  x  1 3/4" in length.

The glass has been set into a patinized brass bezel with elegant tapered prongs.  The cuff is patinized brass as well.

Please let me know if you have any questions.

name: A Garden Scene
description:
This is a part of a series of glass wall panels that I have recently been working on. 

My husband and I fantasize of having a farm someday. For now, photographing the animals and capturing the memories in glass makes me happy, and is slightly more realistic. 

The glass measures appoximately 3/16" thick x 6 1/2" in height x 6 1/2" in length, and it sits off of the wall 1".

Please let me know if you have any questions, or if you would like to see more of the animals.

A template will be included with the packaging materials, it will help you to accurately drill holes in the wall for the brackets.

The glass measures 1/4" thick  x  7 1/4" in height  x  15" in length, and it sits off of the wall 1".

Please let me know if you have any questions, or if you would like to see more of the animals.

The glass has been set into a patinized brass bezel with elegant tapered prongs.  The cuff is patinized brass as well.

name: A Modern Hex Series, Earrings
description:
These earrings are a combination of resin, glass, patinized brass, and sterling silver.

The top hex is backed with a solid sheet of sterling silver and the post is sterling as well.

Our focus is on attempting to find a balance between modern and vintage styles, with the hope of creating a piece of jewelry that will be enjoyed by generations.  

Please let us know if you have any questions at all, 508.991.0747.

options.name: E020 Hex Earrings Sky w/Hints of Mauve

name: Hex Necklace
description:
On sale.  Regularly priced at $180.

Saturated tones of resin have been cast into the hexagonal matrix.

Only available in SKY.

The chain on this necklace is an 18" oxidized sterling silver chain.  You can adjust the length by attaching the clasp into a different link.

Hex Bezel measures appx.  1.8cm  x  2.7cm.

We are feverishly preparing for the holiday season with saturated jewel tones and tons of new feminine patterns.  

Goodies from previous seasons will be on sale.  

Please let us know if you have any questions.

All sale items will be packaged in organza gift bags and shipped via Priority Mail.

name: Leather Belts
description:
Leather belt straps to be paired with your favorite STF belt buckles.

I apologize that the options are limited, this weekend our belt buckles were the hot item.

Please let us know if you need any help with sizing.
508.991.0747

We have a few other belt options available at our showroom.  If you do not see what you are looking for online, give us a call and we will send you a snapshot of what we have available.

Please note that there will be slight variations in each belt, as each piece of leather has its own characteristics.

name: Linear Series III
description:
Round spheres sit along side of one another, forming a linear composition in Jade.

The chain is oxidized sterling silver that measures 22.5" in length (including beads). The beads are strung along a patinized brass wire.

name: Linear Series V
description:
Tourmaline and Labradorite beads sit along side of one another, forming a tonal gradation from petal pink to slate.

The chain is oxidized sterling silver that measures 20" in length (including beads). The beads are strung along a patinized brass wire. The chain is adjustable.

name: Skull Bracelet
description:
This is a cuff bracelet.

The skull and honeycomb designs are created out of glass.  Different metals are used within the layers of glass to create the patterns.  The glass is carved by hand after it has been fired to bring out the details from within the surface.  The glass including the bezel measures 3/16" thick  x  1 1/2" in height  x  1 3/4" in length.

The glass has been set into a patinized brass bezel with elegant tapered prongs.  The cuff is patinized brass as well.

Please let me know if you have any questions.

name: Linear Serires I
description:
Tourmaline beads sit along side of one another, forming a tonal gradation in gray with opalescent highlights in blue and lavender.

The chain is oxidized sterling silver that measures 18" in length (including beads). The beads are strung along a patinized brass wire.

name: Linear Series IV
description:
Tourmaline beads sit along side of one another, forming a tonal gradation from petal pink to deep charcoal.

The chain is oxidized sterling silver that measures 18.5" in length (including beads). The beads are strung along a patinized brass wire. The chain is adjustable.

name: Custom Order for DM
description: Necklace.

name: Blue Bubbles Over Sunflower Silk
description:
Hot off the press...

Pair this belt with your favorite cocktail dress, or jeans and a t-shirt.  

STF has collaborated with the amazing Rhonda M. Fazio of Dyer Maker Studio, who is the creator of the luscious silk.  She implements the ancient textile design techniques of Japanese shibori and the art of natural dyeing.

The buckle is kilnformed glass.  Different metals have been used within the glass to create the blue bubbles. 1.125" x 1.5"

The silk measure 50" in length, and the glass is 1.125" x 1.5".  

More to come soon.

name: N031
description:
Harmonious hexagons, once again.

This necklace is a combination of glass and oxidized sterling silver.

The glass has been carved by hand to unveil the linear matrix hidden within its layers.

This necklace adjusts from 17"  to 18", to make sure that it falls perfectly.

Please let us know if you have any questions.

name: Hex Matrix Post Earrings
description:
A perfect post for Spring.

These earrings are made of sterling silver, patinized brass, and resin.  Additive and subtractive processes were implemented to create the intricate pattern.

The back of the bezel and the ear post are made of sterling silver.

Each earrings is 1/8" in thickness and 1/2" in diameter.

name: Ivory and Magenta Buckle
description:
On sale.  Regularly priced at $70.00

Each glass buckle will have its own characteristics due to the chemical reaction that occurs between the glass and the metal, making each pieace truly unique.  

Our selection of leather belts is constantly changing, so send us an email or call us at 508.991.0747 to see what we have available in your size.

We are feverishly preparing for the holiday season with saturated jewel tones and tons of new feminine patterns.
